# Passive Voice Positive Cases (Should Warn)

Each line uses passive voice and should trigger a warning.

1. The feature was implemented last week.
2. Tests are executed automatically.
3. The database is updated nightly.
4. Users were notified of changes.
5. The code was reviewed before merge.
6. Errors are logged to the console.
7. The API is documented in OpenAPI.
8. Changes were deployed to production.
9. The UI is rendered on the server.
10. Sessions are stored in Redis.
11. The migration was applied successfully.
12. Tickets are created automatically.
13. The cache is invalidated on update.
14. Results were analyzed by the team.
15. The config is loaded at startup.
16. Events are published to the queue.
17. The schema was validated before save.
18. Alerts are sent via email.
19. The report is generated weekly.
20. Permissions are checked on every request.
